newsitem.title: RUSSIA: PRESS DIGEST - IZVESTIA - RUSSIA - MAY 19.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - IZVESTIA - RUSSIA - MAY 19.

text.p: The following are some of the leading stories in the May 20 edition of Russia's Izvestia newspaper. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Russia has finished work on the main module of the joint Russian-U.S. space station Alpha.
- Former advisor to President Boris Yeltsin, Sergei Stankevich, facing extradiction from Poland to Russia on corruption charges, says he will not have a fair trial in Moscow.
- There is a slow-burning political crisis in Russia which could break into the open in the autumn.
- People in Finland were shocked to learn that former Russian diplomats in Helsinki had used their positions to smuggle arms into Russia.
- The production-sharing agreement for investors remains a bone of contention between different factions in the Duma.
